posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 18 Low Grade T206 w/HOF's  **LOT IS SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are obviously lower grade cards, many with major condition issues. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**LOT HAS BEEN SOLD...THANKS FOR LOOKING**
Sending PM on Becker and Pfeister.
